Hi everybody,

I am new to this forum and to heritrix for that matter. I got to know
a lot about heritrix after reading some of the mails here and am glad
to see that people here are willing to help others.

I have couple of questions and it would be wonderful if any of the
Heritrix experts here can help me out. 

a. From what I have assimilated about Heritrix it seems that it does
not have any option for doing a Focused crawl yet. Till now I was
using iVia focused crawler but I want to know if I can do the same
with Heritrix.

b. Is there any way I can hook up a classifier like Bow with Heritrix
and hence run a simple focused crawl?  By running a focused crawl I
mean (something of the sort of) taking into consideration the
judgement of a trained classifier before adding any URL to Frontier.

Please let me know if anyone of you have used Heritrix to run a
focused crawl and how you did it. 

thanks in advance,

Saurabh
